SEARCH
Package Millgame.View

Klasse View

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PApplet
Millgame.View.View
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IView, processing.core.PConstants
public class View extends processing.core.PApplet implements IView
Visualize the Application and draw game. Must contain all public classes from Controller interface to use them.
